name: Egg Trek
description:
PRESS R IF SOFTLOCKED

HOLD PLAY BUTTON ON INSTRUCTION SCREEN

Music doesn't seem to work unfortunately :(

------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the mouse only jam 2.

In this game, drag and drop an egg through a cave to rescue it back to its nest! Encounter springs, spikes, conveyor belts and weird orange fuzz.

Can you collect all 32 golden eggs along the way?

Good luck!

- RKI3000
